data.title: Company Pranjal Projects Pvt. Ltd. - Unick Placement
data.snippet:
Company profile: Pranjal Projects provides a range of services, including sheet metal fabrication, pre-engineered buildings (PEB), and heavy engineering fabrication.
 Key products and services:
  + Structural steel solutions for infrastructure projects like steel bridges and railway stations.
  + Fabricated components for earth-moving equipment and heavy machinery.
  + Heavy engineering equipment, including boilers, pressure vessels, and storage tanks for industries such as oil, gas, and power.
  + Various steel products like TMT bars, plates, and beams. [...] Post Job

 Pranjal Projects Pvt. Ltd.

Pranjal Projects Pvt. Ltd. 

Engineering Consultant

Open Position

Company Description

Pranjal Projects Pvt Ltd was originally founded as a partnership firm in 1980 by H.C. Bhatia and was incorporated as a private limited company in 2002. It is now promoted by H.C. Bhatia and his sons, Vikas and Deepak Bhatia. The company is an Indian infrastructure and fabrication firm specializing in structural steel solutions for a diverse range of industries.

Established date

While the company was founded as a partnership firm in 1980, it was formally incorporated as Pranjal Projects Private Limited on May 13, 2002. [...] Certification and technology: The company is an ISO-certified firm that uses advanced technology, such as robotic and laser-guided welding, and adheres to OHSAS safety practices. It is also an approved provider for railways and bridges by the Research Designs and Standards Organisation (RDSO).

data.title: Pranjal Projects | LinkedIn
data.snippet: Welcome to Pranjal Projects Pvt. Ltd., a beacon of excellence in sheet metal fabrication since 1980. Our commitment to continuous improvement is embodied in the principles of Kaizen, ensuring that every aspect of our operations is refined for optimal efficiency and quality. Specializing in high-rise steel buildings, bridges, metro systems, airports, and railway construction, Pranjal Projects is also a distinguished manufacturer of parts for cranes and the OEM industry. From precision-engineered buckets and skids to intricately crafted cabins and chassis, our expertise extends across a diverse range of products. Pranjal Projects is proud to be an ISO-certified company, exemplifying our unwavering dedication to maintaining the highest standards in every endeavor. We have implemented [...] #PranjalProjects #MadeInIndia #IndustrialManufacturing [Likes: 3, Comments: 0]; Pranjal Projects (2w): Pranjal Projects: Precision Manufacturing for Core Heavy Equipment Components At Pranjal Projects, our expertise extends beyond standard attachments to the fabrication of critical core components and complex sub-assemblies for various heavy machinery. This image highlights our advanced capabilities in delivering robust and precisely engineered parts that form the very backbone of your equipment. Our manufacturing prowess covers: Versatile Buckets: Including specialized designs like the 6-in-1 bucket, engineered for multi-functional utility and durability. Structural Bodies & Arms: Producing essential components such as front and rear bodies, booms, and loader arms, built to withstand [...] Council (Bmtpc) Engineers India Limited TANDON DEVELOPMENT CONSULTANTS PRIVATE LIMITED Vinay Gupta Central Building Research Institute (CBRI), Roorkee, Uttarakhand (India) Council for Scientific and Industrial Research (CSIR) Prakriti Architects India & Sub continent [Likes: 19, Comments: 0]; Pranjal Projects (1w): Pranjal Projects: Custom Heavy Fabrication for Complex Industrial Chambers and Assemblies At Pranjal Projects, we excel in delivering bespoke heavy fabrication solutions for the most demanding industrial applications. Our expertise is showcased in complex structures like the "Inlet Chamber Assembly for Rotary Cement Kiln" pictured here, demonstrating our capability to precision-engineer critical components regardless of their intricate design or colossal scale. data.title: Earth‑Moving Parts, Heavy Engineering & Steel Products
data.snippet:
#### Conclusion

Pranjal Projects Pvt. Ltd. is dedicated to advancing the use of solar energy as a sustainable and reliable power source. Our innovative solutions, combined with our commitment to quality and customer satisfaction, make us a trusted partner for solar energy projects of all sizes.

At Pranjal Projects Pvt. Ltd., we offer a wide range of high-quality steel products designed to meet the diverse needs of various industries. Our products are known for their durability, strength, and compliance with international standards, making them ideal for a variety of applications in construction, manufacturing, and infrastructure projects. [...] The construction industry is fundamental to infrastructure development, requiring high-quality materials and innovative solutions to meet the demands of modern architecture. At Pranjal Projects Pvt. Ltd., we offer a wide range of products and services specifically designed to support construction projects of all sizes, from small industrial units to large-scale infrastructure projects like steel bridges, high-rise buildings, and airport terminals. [...] #### Conclusion:

With a focus on quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction, Pranjal Projects Pvt. Ltd. is a trusted partner for construction companies looking for reliable and high-performing steel components. Our expertise and advanced manufacturing capabilities make us the ideal choice for any construction project, from industrial shades to large-scale infrastructure.

The Heavy Engineering sector demands precision, durability, and innovative solutions. Pranjal Projects Pvt. Ltd. excels in providing high-quality components and equipment that meet the rigorous demands of this industry. Our expertise spans across various applications, from pressure vessels to custom-fabricated machinery, ensuring that we can support complex engineering projects with reliable and efficient products.

data.title: Pranjal Projects
data.snippet:
##### Anil, Chief Engineer, Indian Railways

“Their expertise in handling complex bridge construction at challenging locations has been invaluable. Pranjal Projects’ team showed tremendous dedication and technical know-how, ensuring the structures were not only aesthetically pleasing but structurally sound.”

##### Vikram, Lead Structural Consultant, Bridges

“Our collaboration with Pranjal for construction equipment parts has been fantastic. Their components are durable, reliable, and have significantly improved our machinery’s performance.”

##### Suresh, Procurement Lead

“The quality and consistency of their steel products have been unmatched. Pranjal Projects has always delivered custom solutions tailored to our needs, making them a vital partner in our supply chain.” [...] # Ethical & Innovative Steel Solutions

With over 45 years of expertise, Pranjal Projects Pvt. Ltd. stands as one of India’s leading infrastructure and fabrication companies. From the steel that builds India’s tallest structures to precision-engineered components that power heavy machinery, we are committed to excellence, innovation, and sustainable growth.

As the largest Pre-Engineered Building (PEB) supplier and an RDSO-approved provider for railways and bridges, we deliver comprehensive solutions that span multiple sectors, ensuring the success of projects across India.

Read More

years of expertise

India’s largest Pre-Engineered Building supplier [...] “Working with Pranjal Projects for our airport construction was a seamless experience. Their steel solutions not only met the highest quality standards but were also delivered on time, keeping us on track for completion.”

##### Rajesh, Project Head, Airport Authority of India

“Pranjal Projects’ precision in fabricating steel for our railway bridges has been instrumental. Their attention to detail, commitment to deadlines, and adherence to RDSO standards make them a trusted partner.”

##### Anil, Chief Engineer, Indian Railways

data.title: Pranjal Project Final | PDF | Business Plan | Marketing - Scribd
data.snippet:
57 views56 pages

# Pranjal Project Final

The document is a project report submitted by Miss Pranjal Shashank Sawant for her MBA program at Shivaji University, focusing on a business plan for Pranya Industries, a shoe manufacturing company. It includes sections on the introduction, management problems, research objectives, methodology, and the significance of the study, emphasizing the importance of a well-structured business plan for operational success and investor attraction. The report also outlines the research methodology, data collection methods, and limitations of business plans.
